name: 2020 the 10th International Workshop on Computer Science and Engineering
content: Accepted and registered papers can be included in (WCSE conferences proceedings). Papers presented in this conference will also be submitted for inclusion in (Scopus, Ei compendex). { History } The proceedings were successfully indexed within three month since 2014\. WCSE 2014-Winter | Hong Kong| ISBN: 978-981-09-4610-4 WCSE 2014-Summer | Dubai, UAE | ISBN: 978-981-09-4610-4 WCSE 2015 | Bauman Moscow State Technical University, Russia| ISBN: 978-981-09-5471-0 WCSE 2016 | Tokyo University of Science, Japan | ISBN: 978-981-11-0008-6 WCSE 2017 | China Agricultural University, China | ISBN: 978-981-11-3671-9 WCSE 2018| Bangkok, Thailand | ISBN: 978-981-11-7861-0 WCSE 2019| Hong Kong | ISBN: 978-981-14-1684-2 { Submission Method } 1\. Send your manuscript directly to conference official email:wcse\_general@wcse.org 2\.
